name: Kylian Mbappé
description: Explosive forward known for his lightning pace, sharp finishing, and clutch performances. Mbappé leads Real Madrid’s attack as one of the most dominant players of his generation.

name: Erling Haaland
description: A pure goal machine with incredible strength and positioning. Haaland’s clinical finishing and physical dominance make him one of the deadliest strikers in world football.

name: Jude Bellingham
description: Dynamic and composed midfielder who combines intelligence, work rate, and creativity. Bellingham has quickly become a leader for Real Madrid and England.

name: Vinícius Júnior
description: Explosive winger with dazzling dribbling and pace. Vinícius Júnior’s creativity and flair make him one of the most entertaining and feared attackers in world football.

name: Lionel Messi
description: Argentine legend and 8-time Ballon d'Or winner. Messi’s vision, precision passing, and unmatched football IQ have redefined the modern game.

name: Kevin De Bruyne
description: World-class playmaker with pinpoint passing and vision. De Bruyne remains the creative heartbeat of Manchester City’s midfield.

name: Mohamed Salah
description: Liverpool’s talisman and Egyptian icon, Salah’s speed, consistency, and eye for goal make him one of the Premier League’s greatest forwards.

name: Harry Kane
description: Complete striker known for his clinical finishing and leadership. Kane is a record-breaking goalscorer and a key figure for both Bayern Munich and England.

name: Rodri
description: The backbone of Manchester City’s midfield, Rodri combines intelligence, control, and precision passing. A key figure in Guardiola’s tactical setup.

name: Lautaro Martínez
description: Inter Milan’s captain and Argentine striker known for his relentless work rate and finishing. A leader on and off the pitch.

name: Pedri
description: Young maestro with exceptional ball control and football IQ. Pedri is seen as the future of Barcelona’s midfield legacy.

name: Bukayo Saka
description: Arsenal’s golden boy with dazzling dribbles and sharp decision-making. Saka is one of the brightest young talents in world football.

name: Declan Rice
description: Dominant defensive midfielder known for his composure and leadership. Rice anchors Arsenal’s midfield with consistency and power.

name: Thibaut Courtois
description: World-class shot-stopper and one of the best goalkeepers of his era. Courtois is known for his reflexes, composure, and commanding presence.

name: Virgil van Dijk
description: Liverpool’s defensive leader with unmatched strength and positioning. Van Dijk’s calm and control have transformed modern defending.
